name: Fish Savior Simulator
description:
App name: Fish Savior Simulator
  • Author:  Hoàng Nam Anh
  • Age: 12

Main Features:
  • Travelers on the boat whom throw trash to the ocean
  • There are differents kind of sea creature swimming in the ocean
  • The ability to collect trash and clear all the trash
